https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9XSDyG3egNWRIoi5ySjAIUeo9Yk.jpg Award-winning filmmakers Jean-Pierre and Luc Dardenne profess their love for the classic "Modern Times". The directors expose their views on the many aspects of the film, Chaplin's brilliancy and they also provide interesting details about the making of Chaplin's masterpiece. Chaplin Today: Modern Times
